bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Carter Rose, February 20, 1921

div1.p: LePrince sends Carter stegomyia caught in a hotel coatroom in Carbondale, Illinois.

div1.head: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Carter Rose, February 20, 1921
div1.p:
These stegomyia were picked
up here & there on the walls of
the coat room & on clothing
there in the coat room - They were
not hovering around our heads
or in groups in the air -

Its much easier to say catch a
female stegomyia with a bottle
than it is “to get it” Particularly
with a high ceiling room -
div1.closer:
With best wishes
Sincerely yours J A LePrince
P.S.
Howards letter arrived this A M-
We found nothing but stegomyia in the
hotel - on Jan 19/22 & females were
present - when they attacked we made
a search & collection -.
